about_the_game: "Book-Warm" is a cartoony action roguelite with fluid and varied gunfights. To achieve your goal, you can dive into the universes of famous books and fight enemies using any of lots of different guns. Choose any of the passive items that will change your playstyle and try to survive as long as possible. Interact with the characters you encounter during the stories, remember that the decisions you make during your interaction will affect the flow of the story. Choose any option to take your story in any direction and make children's books great again!

short_description: "Book-Warm" is a cartoony action-roguelite featuring fluid and various gun-combat. You can dive in to universes of famous books and rewrite their stories with our own choices. Fight the villians in the books and rewrite the story as you wish to make children books great again!
